name: Professionally Panicked Penguins
description:
get through the levels without getting blasted by the enemy(s) before the time limit. it's easy. made in 6 days for my first game jam (brackeys)

turn your volume down, fullscreen recommended 

 controls: w - jump, a & d - left & right

some levels may not work im too lazy to fix them so if they dont just reload the page

 oh i also forgot, theres 2 pog easter eggs.
